content.text: Aswa is Koza's mother and Toto's wife.
She wears a white wrap around her head and has a light brown robe with purple spots toward the bottom. She has brown hair, and wears thick square glasses with rounded corners.
She is quite caring, being the mother of Koza.
She was able to survive the harsh desert conditions of Alabasta long enough to raise Koza.

She only appears during Vivi's flashback, yelling at Koza to come and eat. It is unknown what happened to her in the present, as she does not appear with Toto in Yuba, does not appear to support Koza, and does not make an appearance for the entire Alabasta Arc.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 18 Chapter 163 and Episode 100, Aswa makes her debut.
↑  One Piece Blue: Grand Data File, Aswa's name revealed.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 18 Chapter 163 and Episode 100, Aswa yells at Koza to come and eat.
